author: bbockelm
body:
The new `CondorDynamicResizeService` will periodically reload the optimal number of TBB threads based on the resources allocated by HTCondor.  If the number of optimal threads is different from the number of threads configured in the original pset, this will submit a TBB task that simply blocks the thread.

To utilize, add the following to the config:

```
process.CondorDynamicResizeService = cms.Service("CondorDynamicResizeService")
```

@Dr15Jones
title: Add service to block/unblock TBB threads based on HTCondor config.
